```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library("diffcoexp")
library("ggpubr")
library("pheatmap")
library("dplyr")

```

## Differential gene co-expression in Alzheimer's Disease.

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=F}
# Loading expression data for differential co-expression data.
# After co-expression analysis and QC, the input for differential co-expression 
# is composed of 214 AD samples and 69 neuronal control.

expression <- as.matrix(read.table("counts/GSE125583_DiffCoexpInput.txt", 
                                   header = T, sep = "\t"))
control <- expression[,215:283]
case <- expression[,1:214]
```


```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=F}
# To perfrom differential gene co-expression analysis.
res = diffcoexp(exprs.1 = control, exprs.2 = case, r.method = "spearman", 
                q.method = "fdr", rth = 0.8, qth = 0.05)
dcgs <- res$DCGs[,c("Gene", "DCLs", "p", "q")]
dcls <- res$DCLs

dcls$p.1 <- NULL
dcls$p.2 <- NULL
dcls$cor.1 <- NULL
dcls$cor.2 <- NULL
dcls$q.1 <- NULL
dcls$q.2 <- NULL
dcls$type <- NULL
dcls

```

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=F}
# Bootstrap (100x) of differential gene co-expression analysis. 
# Each interation sample 70% if samples to perform diffcoexp. 
# The dataframe dcgs.bst stores all DCGs for each iteration.

dcgs.bst <- data.frame(Run = numeric(), Gene = character())

iterations = 100
for (i in 1:iterations) {
  control.aux <- t(sample_n(as.data.frame( t(control) ), 69 * 0.7 ))
  case.aux <- t(sample_n(as.data.frame( t(case) ), 214 * 0.7 ))
  res = diffcoexp(exprs.1 = control.aux, exprs.2 = case.aux, 
                  r.method = "spearman", q.method = "fdr", 
                  rth = 0.8, qth = 0.05)
  dcgs.aux <- res$DCGs
  dcgs.aux$Run <- i
  dcgs.aux <- dcgs.aux[, c("Run", "Gene")]
  if (nrow(dcgs.aux) > 0) {
    dcgs.bst <- rbind(dcgs.bst, dcgs.aux)
  }
}

# After bootstrap, we calculate the accuracy for each DCG, 
# which were identified by diffcoexp using all samples to identify 
# variation in co-expression.

acc <- as.data.frame(table(dcgs.bst$Gene))
acc <- acc[acc$Var1 %in% c("FAM153B", "CYP2C8", "CKMT1B"), ]
acc$Freq <- acc$Freq / 100

library("ggplot2")
library("ggpubr")

ggbarplot(acc, x = "Var1", y = "Freq", 
          xlab = "Differential co-expressed gene", 
          ylab = "Stability", ggtheme = theme_bw(),
          fill = "Var1", label = T, 
          lab.pos = "out", ylim = c(0, 1)) + rremove("legend")

```

## Including Plots

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=F}

# Dataframe to add annotations of AD status to heatmap plots.
my_sample_col <- data.frame(sample = rep(c("AD", "Control"), c(214, 69)))
row.names(my_sample_col) <- colnames(expression)

# Plot heatmap with all co-expressed genes.
pheatmap(expression, cluster_rows = T, cluster_cols = T, scale = "row", 
         clustering_distance_rows = "euclidean", 
         clustering_distance_cols = "euclidean",
         show_rownames = F, show_colnames = F, annotation_col = my_sample_col)

# Plot heatmap with genes in DCLs.
dcls.expression <- expression[rownames(expression) %in% union(dcls$Gene.1, dcls$Gene.2),]

pheatmap(dcls.expression, cluster_rows = T, cluster_cols = T, scale = "row",
         clustering_distance_rows = "euclidean",
         clustering_distance_cols = "euclidean",
         show_rownames = F, show_colnames = F,
         annotation_col = my_sample_col)
```
